name: Candy Blast||#Games #Art #All V1.1
description:
Hope you enjoy!

Follow me for more epic fun games! :D

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions-

-Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.

-Blast Those Candy's which block your path.

-This is an ENDLESS game, so keep blasting those Candy's till you wanna stop xD

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updates:

20/7/2021- Made the candy pick a random color as it spawns.

Quote-

-Mehthab
